titleStmt.title: A heartie prayer, in a needfull time of trouble. The sermon preached at Theobalds, before his Maiestie, and the lords of the Priuie Councell, an houre before the death of our late soueraigne King Iames. On Sunday, March 27. / By D. Price, deane of Hereford, then in attendance, and now chaplaine in ordinarie to his Maiestie.
titleStmt.author: Price, Daniel, 1581-1631.

titleStmt.title: A heartie prayer, in a needfull time of trouble. The sermon preached at Theobalds, before his Maiestie, and the lords of the Priuie Councell, an houre before the death of our late soueraigne King Iames. On Sunday, March 27. / By D. Price, deane of Hereford, then in attendance, and now chaplaine in ordinarie to his Maiestie.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. Flesher, for Iohn Grismand, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Gun in Paules Alley,

notesStmt.note: Running title: The sermon at Theobalds, an houre before the death of King Iames.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
